duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Pickleball Coordinator and Tennis Manager in maintaining the day-to-day operations of the Pickleball Department.
Schedule court time and educate members on Pickleball programs, lessons, and equipment.
Provide exceptional customer service to encourage repeat business.
Greet, schedule court time and assist members in a friendly and professional manner.
Explain all Pickleball programs, services, and equipment to members and assist them with determining their individual needs.
Initiate, develop, and maintain personalized relationships with members.
Ensure all pickleball facilities and equipment are clean, organized, and in good working condition.
Promote all Pickleball programs, products, and services.
Ensure all daily billing is completed accurately and efficiently and reconcile the cash register at the end of a shift.

education_certification.credential: Working toward a High School Diploma or GED
CPR and AED Certified within the first 30 days of hire
